meanings.definition: A period of practice in basketball where players shoot baskets to warm up before a game.
meanings.sent1: During the shootarounds, the players focused on improving their shooting skills.
meanings.sent2: The coach scheduled a shootaround to prepare the team for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: The shootarounds turned into a friendly competition among the players.
meanings.sent4: The sound of basketballs echoing in the gym during shootarounds was music to their ears.
meanings.sent5: The team's success was attributed to their dedicated shootarounds before every game.

meanings.definition: The act of shooting baskets during a practice session.
meanings.sent1: The coach emphasized the importance of consistent shootarounds to improve accuracy.
meanings.sent2: Players were exhausted after intense shootarounds to enhance their shooting skills.
meanings.sent3: The shootarounds became a favorite part of practice for the team.
meanings.sent4: The rhythm of the shootarounds set the tone for the rest of the training session.
meanings.sent5: The team's chemistry flourished during their synchronized shootarounds.
